Package org.jsfml.graphics

Class BasicTransformable

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.graphics.BasicTransformable
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformable
public class BasicTransformable extends Object implements Transformable
Implementation of the Transformable interface.

Classes can inherit from this in order to provide the Transformable interface. The implementation equals that of the original SFML implementation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    BasicTransformable()
    Default constructor, initializes this object with an identity transformation.
